title: Kicked out of my own club
body: So a while back the clubs were out of order, but i didn't mind that since i wasn't playing league at the time. But now, I'm kicked out of my own club, although I created it. . My username is Godmez, and the club name was Dankerino. Help rito, I will pay four cents if you help.

replies.body:
Send in a support ticket.

Same thing happened to me. When Clubs broke the fix caused some the club to not show up for the Owners despite everyone else seeing your name in it.

You must send a support ticket with the following:

Club Name:
Club Tag:
Other members or the name of an Officer in the club:
Can other members see your name:

The Officer will be granted ownership of the club as you have to be removed in order to be re-added. You will need to ask for ownership back from that person.
If your club does not have an officer, you must nominate a member to gain ownership.
